snippet.title: Debtor: Enhanced Edition - Windows 10 Gameplay
snippet.description:
NOTE: This footage is from the Windows 10 version, as the Xbox One version is a separate release with its own achievement list.

Remember the Indie Heroes Collection 1 cart for the Evercade? You might have seen Debtor for the MegaDrive as part of my tour. But did you know there is a new and improved version of the game for Xbox One and Windows 10?
